text: Great school with many helpful teachers and students! :)

Went there for my kid's Sec 1 orientation yesterday. The energy level and vibes are amazingly high and positive. Kudos to the organising committee in making this such a memorable event. Looking forward to hearing more from my kid as she embarks on her learning journey as a BPian at BPGHS. üòÄüëçüèª‚ú®

The weather is so hot but we are still expected to go back to wearing the school uniform?? The girls cannot even take off their skirts with their school uniform. Just because there was a typhoon on 17 Sept doesn't mean the temperature has suddenly dropped. The weather forecast says otherwise..
